page.title: 05A PLAYGROUND GAME
page.content: {STUCK IN THE MUD} Only 11 people at the most can play this game. One person is called 'it'.Everybody else takes hold of a finger of whoever is 'it'.The person who is 'it' says a sentence like "I went to the woods and I got stuck in the .....". When the person says mud everybody leaves go of the person's fingers and runs away. The first person touched by 'it' becomes 'it' and the game starts again. The object of the game is never to be caught and become 'it'. We play this game at playtimes, along with other games like British Bulldogs, Sticking Glue,Coloured Eggs, rounders and football.
